sentences.en: A fawn behind the tree looked at us curiously.
sentences.cn: 树后面一只小鹿好奇地看着我们.

sentences.en: A small brown fawn hopped across the trail in front of them.
sentences.cn: 一只棕色的小鹿蹦跳着穿过他们面前的那条小路。

sentences.en: A: He said you fawn on the manager in order to get a promotion.
sentences.cn: 他说你为了获得提拔,拍经理的马屁.

sentences.en: Among them was LL Cool J in a tailor - made fawn - colored suit.
sentences.cn: 在她们之间的是 埃勒 ·酷,穿一件特制的鹿色西装.

sentences.en: Fear the fearsome fury of the forest fawn!
sentences.cn: 森林小鹿的可怕愤怒,害怕吧!

sentences.en: He abandoned every particle of self - respect cringe and fawn.
sentences.cn: 他把 自尊心 丢得一干二净.

sentences.en: He ordered fawn to look for the tortoise and ask why it was absent.
sentences.cn: 他命令小鹿去找乌龟,问它为什么缺席.

sentences.en: He spotted a fawn coming out of the forest.
sentences.cn: 他看到一头小鹿正从林子里走了出来.

sentences.en: Look, over there, a little fawn!
sentences.cn: 看, 就在那里, 一只小鹿!

sentences.en: Still , that fawn looked right at me.
The fawn ran to the top of the ridge.
There was something familiar about him, his fawn raincoat, his thinness, the way he moved.
sentences.cn: 他有点眼熟——浅黄褐色雨衣，瘦削的身影，走路的姿态。

sentences.en: There was something of the fawn in her grace and startled eyes.
sentences.cn: 她那腼腆的温文神情和受惊的眼神里有一种媚态.

sentences.en: You must guard against those who fawn upon you and bow obsequiously before you!
sentences.cn: 对阿谀奉承、点头哈腰的人要格外警惕!

trans.tran_cn: （未满一岁的）幼鹿，浅黄褐色，小动物

trans.tran_en: to seek attention and admiration (from) by cringing and flattering
